Package DAO

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
Handles database operations related to customers within the application. It provides functionalities for creating, updating, deleting, and fetching customer records. This class simplifies the interaction with the database by abstracting complex SQL queries and providing a straightforward API for managing customer data.

  • Constructor Details

      public CustomerDAO()

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      public static void createCustomer(String Customer_Name, String Address, String Postal_Code, String Phone, int Division_ID)
      Inserts a new customer into the database. The method constructs an SQL statement to insert customer details and executes it using a PreparedStatement to protect against SQL injection.
      Parameters:
      Customer_Name - The name of the customer.
      Address - The address of the customer.
      Postal_Code - The postal code of the customer's address.
      Phone - The phone number of the customer.
      Division_ID - The database ID of the division the customer belongs to.

    • editCustomer

      public static void editCustomer(String Customer_Name, String Address, String Postal_Code, String Phone, int Division_ID, int Customer_ID)
      Updates an existing customer's data in the database based on the customer ID. The method allows modification of all customer details except for the customer ID, which is used to uniquely identify the record to update.
      Parameters:
      Customer_Name - The new name of the customer.
      Address - The new address of the customer.
      Postal_Code - The new postal code of the customer's address.
      Phone - The new phone number of the customer.
      Division_ID - The new division ID of the customer.
      Customer_ID - The ID of the customer to update.

    • deleteCustomerFromDB

      public static void deleteCustomerFromDB(int Customer_ID)
      Deletes a customer from the database using the customer ID as a key.
      Parameters:
      Customer_ID - The ID of the customer to delete.

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves a list of all customers from the database. This method queries the database for all records in the customers table, constructs Customer objects for each, and returns them in an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing Customer objects representing all customers in the database.

    • getAllCustomerIDs

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Integer> getAllCustomerIDs()
      Fetches a list of all customer IDs from the database. This method is useful for populating UI elements that require a list of customer IDs, or for validation purposes.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing Integer objects, each representing a unique customer ID from the database.
